/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. 

On either side of the street, tall buildings rise, their facades predominantly white and green, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and blue. These structures tower over the street, their towering presence a testament to the city's architectural prowess.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars, painted in shades of red, white, and black, are scattered across the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene.

The perspective of the image is particularly striking. Taken from a low angle, it offers a view that looks up at the buildings and cars, lending a sense of grandeur to the everyday hustle and bustle of city life.
